metadata.name: Abusing Print Executable
metadata.comment: Attackers can use print.exe for remote file copy

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\print.exe')) AND startswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('print')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/d')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.exe')) AND NOT contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('print.exe')))

output.summary: Attackers can use print.exe for remote file copy
